title: RTP Control Protocol (RTCP) Extended Report (XR) Block for Packet Delay Variation Metric Reporting
source: Metric Blocks for use with RTCP's Extended Report Framework RAI
abstract:
This document defines an RTP Control Protocol (RTCP) Extended Report
(XR) block that allows the reporting of packet delay variation
metrics for a range of RTP applications.  [STANDARDS-TRACK]
